dmca.title: messages 71 and following on your blog (conformation vs grading results)
dmca.body:
Jessica,

I come back to the accusations that have been made on your website against 
me by Mr Buss, supported by yourself. You have absolutely no right to decide 
to publish such purposes that diffamate me. By doing so you commit an 
insult, calumny and press delict and are liable fro this as author, 
co-author or accomplice.

Furthermore, you as publisher of this website are liable for the content and 
have failed to give me the opportunity of immediate answering for which you 
are liable. By authorizing this publication for over one week without 
informing me you have caused me an incredible commercial dommage and 
according to our laws you are liable for this, here in Luxembourg. So I 
request you to delete the messages from 71 and following as well all those 
which are insulting against me immediately, as soon as you get this message 
otherwise I will  also include you in the complaint as co-author or 
accomplice of the purposes of Mr Buss and claim dommages against you.

It is far from my wishes to invest my time in law suits but if I am forced, 
I will and am not accepting that I will be forever be stamped on this web as 
a thief even if I have given the correct version of the truth.

Mich
dmca.principal_name: Kara Leylek Stud - Michele van Kasteren
